divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my deck looking East towards hartford and saw a very bright white flashing light flying across Bristol, the fastest object Ive ever seen. No sound or shape what so ever, just the strobing light. got to about the Hartford area in 5 seconds and took an abrupt right turn towards the South and it was out of range in less than 8 seconds total. It was not the flashing towers in Plainville and it wasn't a plane. Im planning on making a full report tomorrow.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Bristol
There was one other sighting in Bristol on or around May 13th 2012
Summary: Strobing lights flew at very high speed across Bristol and took a right turn towards the south
